Slobrojoe,"2020-01-12T18:46:58.333Z","Another Clone Wars micro scale model that doesnâ€™t disappoint...","

This Clone Wars model is a must buy. It is similar to the Republic Attack Cruiser, see my review.
The set comes in a poly bag. It'
column2: s instructions are a flip book which has several pieces and could be complicated to a beginner.

column1: Most of the parts are red and grey.
The parts help with the build to maintain a streamlined shape. The cylinder also helps with this. The tri-engines are cool. It takes approximately 5 to 10 minutes to build.
This is a really good set and is vital for micro scale Clone attacks.
